page.title: 17Block-aid, Dodd Cottage
page.content:
In our area there is a drain-cleaning company called{Block- } {aid.}They use pressure hoses, jetters etc. The secretary answers the phone and does invoices. There are branches at Kellas and Carnoustie and also at other places in Scotland.
There are 6 workers. My Dad goes over the border and all over Britain, and he has a person in Manchester who sells him lorries. He has 2 Mercedes vans, 1 jetting lorry, 1 pickup truck and 1 small van.Block-aid also do {descaling, getting dirt off } {ships'sides and cleaning dirty oil } {tanks.}My Dad checks jobs before he does them so that he can take the proper equipment.
So if anyone has a blocked drain, call Block-aid.
